ViewObject.Name: PropRegionCustomerView
ViewObject.SelectList: PropRegionCustomer.CUSTOMER_ID, PropRegionCustomer.PROPOSAL_ID, (SELECT ARC.CUSTOMER_NUMBER || ' ' || ARC.CUSTOMER_NAME FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS ARC WHERE ARC.CUSTOMER_ID = PropRegionCustomer.CUSTOMER_ID) AS CUSTOMER_NAME, (SELECT ARC.ATTRIBUTE3 FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS ARC WHERE ARC.CUSTOMER_ID = PropRegionCustomer.CUSTOMER_ID) AS REGION_CODE

ViewAttribute.Name: CustomerName
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT ARC.CUSTOMER_NUMBER || ' ' || ARC.CUSTOMER_NAME FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS ARC WHERE ARC.CUSTOMER_ID = PropRegionCustomer.CUSTOMER_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: RegionCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT ARC.ATTRIBUTE3 FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS ARC WHERE ARC.CUSTOMER_ID = PropRegionCustomer.CUSTOMER_ID
